001    package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002    
003    import java.util.ArrayList;
004    
005    /**
006     *      Internal context of an ad instance.
007     *
008     *      Note:
009     *              Some methods and references to ICreativeRendition and ICreativeRenditionAsset
010     *              are *not* available for player right now.
011     */
012    public interface IAdInstance {
013            /**
014             * Get the ad id.
015             *
016             * @return an int value represent ad id
017             */
018            public int getAdId();
019    
020            /**
021             * Get IRendererController of the ad. Only for player use.
022             *
023             * @return IRendererController of the ad
024             */
025            public IRendererController getRendererController();
026    
027            /**
028             * Retrieve the parameters from the ad instance.
029             *
030             * The parameter value will be retrieved from levels in the following order:
031             * override, creative rendition, creative, slot, profile, global.
032             * Only for player use.
033             *
034             * @param    name    parameter name
035             * @return the value of the parameter
036             */
037            public Object getParameter(String name);
038    
039            /**
040             *      Get the ad slot which contain this ad. Only for renderer use.
041             *
042             *      @return an object of ISlot
043             */
044            public ISlot getSlot();
045    
046            /**
047             *      Get active rendition of the ad instance. Only for renderer use.
048             *
049             *      @return an object of ICreativeRendition
050             */
051            public ICreativeRendition getActiveCreativeRendition();
052    
053            /**
054             *      Get all renditions of this ad instance. Only for renderer use.
055             *
056             *      @return an ArrayList of type ICreativeRendition
057             */
058            public ArrayList<ICreativeRendition> getAllCreativeRenditions();
059    
060            /**
061             * Get renderable renditions of this ad instance. Only for renderer use.
062             *
063             * @return an ArrayList of renderable ICreativeRendition
064             */
065            public ArrayList<ICreativeRendition> getRenderableCreativeRenditions();
066    
067            /**
068             *      Set the active rendition of this ad, this rendition will finally be showed. Only for renderer use.
069             *
070             *      @param rendition the active rendition will be set
071             */
072            public void setActiveCreativeRendition(ICreativeRendition rendition);
073    
074            /**
075             * Add a creative rendition to the ad instance. Only for renderer use.
076             *
077             * @return the ICreativeRendition object added to the ad instance
078             */
079            public ICreativeRendition createCreativeRenditionForTranslation();
080    
081            /**
082             * Append additional tracking URLs to certain event specified by eventName and eventType. Only for renderer use.
083             *
084             * @param eventName name of the event
085             * @param eventType type of the event
086             * @param urls ArrayList of URLs to be added
087             * <br/>
088             * <br/>
089             * Available combination of input:<br/>
090             *              (EVENT_AD_IMPRESSION, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       impression, aka ad display start<br/>
091             *              (EVENT_AD_CLICK,      EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       click tracking<br/>
092             *              ("a_custom_string",   EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       custom click tracking<br/>
093             *              (EVENT_AD_FIRST_QUARTILE,     EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       1st quartile<br/>
094             *              (EVENTCALLBACK_MIDPOINT,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       middle point<br/>
095             *              (EVENTCALLBACK_THIRDQUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       3rd quartile<br/>
096             *              (EVENTCALLBACK_COMPLETE,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       complete<br/>
097             *              (EVENT_AD_PAUSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, pause<br/>
098             *              (EVENT_AD_RESUME,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, resume<br/>
099             *              (EVENT_AD_REWIND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, rewind<br/>
100             *              (EVENT_AD_MUTE,               EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, mute<br/>
101             *              (EVENT_AD_UNMUTE,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, unmute<br/>
102             *              (EVENT_AD_COLLAPSE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, collapse<br/>
103             *              (EVENT_AD_EXPAND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, expand<br/>
104             *              (EVENT_AD_MINIMIZE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, minimize<br/>
105             *              (EVENT_AD_CLOSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, close<br/>
106             *              (EVENT_AD_ACCEPT_INVITATION,  EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, accept invitation<br/>
107             */
108            public void addEventCallbackURLs(String eventName, String eventType, final ArrayList<String> urls);
109    
110            /**
111             * Set click through URL (replaces the CR value). Only for renderer use.
112             *
113             * @param url URL in String
114             * @param clickName name of the click in String, if clickName is null or empty, will set click through url to default click callback
115             */
116            public void setClickThroughURL(String url, String clickName);
117    
118            /**
119             * Get the event callback URLs in an ArrayList. Only for renderer use.
120             *
121             * @param eventName name of the event
122             * @param eventType type of the event
123             * @return ArrayList of event callback URLs
124             * <br/>
125             * <br/>
126             * Available combination of input:<br/>
127             *              (EVENT_AD_IMPRESSION, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       impression, aka ad display start<br/>
128             *              (EVENT_AD_CLICK,      EVENT_TYPE_CLICK)                 -       click through<br/>
129             *              (EVENT_AD_CLICK,      EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       click tracking<br/>
130             *              ("a_custom_string",   EVENT_TYPE_CLICK)                 -       custom click<br/>
131             *              ("a_custom_string",   EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       custom click tracking<br/>
132             *              (EVENT_AD_FIRST_QUARTILE,     EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       1st quartile<br/>
133             *              (EVENTCALLBACK_MIDPOINT,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       middle point<br/>
134             *              (EVENTCALLBACK_THIRDQUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       3rd quartile<br/>
135             *              (EVENTCALLBACK_COMPLETE,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       complete<br/>
136             *              (EVENT_AD_PAUSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, pause<br/>
137             *              (EVENT_AD_RESUME,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, resume<br/>
138             *              (EVENT_AD_REWIND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, rewind<br/>
139             *              (EVENT_AD_MUTE,               EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, mute<br/>
140             *              (EVENT_AD_UNMUTE,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, unmute<br/>
141             *              (EVENT_AD_COLLAPSE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, collapse<br/>
142             *              (EVENT_AD_EXPAND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, expand<br/>
143             *              (EVENT_AD_MINIMIZE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, minimize<br/>
144             *              (EVENT_AD_CLOSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, close<br/>
145             *              (EVENT_AD_ACCEPT_INVITATION,  EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, accept invitation<br/>
146             */
147            public ArrayList<String> getEventCallbackURLs(String eventName, String eventType);
148            
149            /**
150             *      Get the playable companion ad instances.
151             *      
152             *      @return an ArrayList of <IAdInstance> instances
153             */
154            public ArrayList<IAdInstance> getCompanionAdInstances();
155            
156            /**
157             *      Whether the ad is required to be shown by law, usually the ad is a companion ad.
158             *      
159             *      @return true if this ad is required to be shown, otherwise false
160             */
161            public boolean isRequiredToShow();
162    }
